scripts.signer:build:tray-host:win: dotnet publish apps/edo-signer-tray-host -c Release -r win-x64 -p:PublishSingleFile=true -p:SelfContained=true -p:DebugType=None -p:DebugSymbols=false -o installer/build && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const dir='installer/build';const files=fs.existsSync(dir)?fs.readdirSync(dir).filter(f=>f.toLowerCase().endsWith('.exe')):[];if(!files.length){console.error('No exe produced in '+dir);process.exit(2)}const src=path.join(dir,files[0]);const dst=path.join(dir,'vrplike-signer-tray.exe');if(src!==dst){fs.copyFileSync(src,dst);}const s=fs.statSync(dst).size;if(!s){console.error('Empty tray exe: '+dst);process.exit(3)}console.log('Tray exe ready:',dst,'size',s,'src',src);"
